last_episode_to_air.name: Kharzem Fortress (Part 2)
last_episode_to_air.overview: The fight between good and evil, it boils down to Lena versus Oslo.

name: Skyland
overview:
Skyland, is a CGI animated television series developed in France in partnership with Canada and Luxembourg for television channels France 2, Teletoon, NickToons Network, ABC and CITV.

A 60-minute, worldwide preview was aired on November 26, 2005, at multiple times during the day and the following day. The program was hosted by Chase Francisco. It was launched on April 22, 2006, at 7:30 p.m. on Teletoon. On July 2, 2006, an encore of the one hour pilot aired on Nicktoons Network, with the full series commencing on Saturday, November 18, 2006. The show is produced by Paris's Method Films and Toronto's 9 Story Entertainment.

episodes.name: Dawn of a New Day (Part 1)
episodes.overview: When the Sphere comes to Mila's home, and her kids react, she has to use her Seijin powers to defend them. It ends up getting her taken by the Sphere, while Mila's children, Mahad and Lena, have to get away from them before they get taken away too.

episodes.name: Dawn of a New Day (Part 2)
episodes.overview: When the Sphere comes to Mila's home, and her kids react, she has to use her Seijin powers to defend them. It ends up getting her taken by the Sphere, while Mahad and Lena have to get away from them before they get taken away too.

episodes.name: The Great Wall
episodes.overview:
After Lena uses her water to save a plant from Babylonia, her home block, she starts to dehydrate, and The Pirates try to find a giant ice block.

When they discover the sphere got to it first, they must enter a drilling station. The only problem is that the drilling station has a dangerous monster called the 'Mogura' that has malfunctioned and tries to kill every human it sees.

episodes.name: Mogura
episodes.overview: A sphere ship is shot down containing 3 seijin refugees. When the two 'parent' refugees take over the ship though, Mahad and Lena learn that they aren't really refugees, and Cecilia, the little girl, is their seijin hostage.

episodes.name: The Raging Archipelago
episodes.overview:
Mahad and Lena follow a stranger named Sansken, whom the pirates rescue. They heard that he is going to Kharzem Prison, and they know that mother is being kept there.

They find out that Sansken has lured them there as a trap, but it's not going to be easy getting back out now.

episodes.name: Eye of the Storm
episodes.overview: Mahad and Lena receive a distress call from their father and go off in search of him. Unknowingly, Oslo follows them, and they all end up stranded on a block that contains an indestructable monster.

episodes.name: Mutiny
episodes.overview: Oslo takes control of Dahlia to try to find the pirate's block. Dahlia can't do anything to fight it, and no body else really knows what is going on.

episodes.name: Manipulations
episodes.overview: Mahad and Lena end up getting captured when they go to Ningxia. In jail they meet a powerful Seijin who just may be the key to letting Lena speak to her mother. Will they be able to get a message through?

episodes.name: King for a day
episodes.overview: After Lena receives a message from her mother, Mahad and her go back to their home to try to find her. Will they?

episodes.name: Red Rock People
episodes.overview: Mahad and Lena receive a distress call from their father and go off in search of him. Unknowingly, Oslo follows them, and they all end up stranded on a block that contains an indestructable monster.

episodes.name: Babylonia
episodes.overview: Mahad and Dahlia are stuck together in the Hyperion on a giant ice block drifting towards Puerto Angel. The ship won't fly, and the only way to stop the ice block may be to blow it up it - with them on it.

episodes.name: Blood Ties
episodes.overview: Mahad and Lena take two people back to Puerto Angel. They claim to be innocent travellers but the Rebels suspect otherwise when they learn that the Sphere is after their guests.

episodes.name: Life in Puerto Angel
episodes.overview: Mahad is left in charge of Puerto Angel, and after being tricked into believing that sphere ships were headed his way, he decides to ignore the warning when they really are coming, leaving everybody in danger.

episodes.name: Shadows of the Past
episodes.overview: Inside a water tanker, Mahad and Lena find Oslo, almost dead, and he's set the water tanker on a route to his home.

episodes.name: The Heart of the Arena
episodes.overview: Mahad is ambushed and taken to fight for Tak, the ringmaster of the Sphere's gladiatorial fighting arena. As Mahad's time to fight draws near, Lena, Dhalia, and Cortes try to rescue him.

episodes.name: Wind Devils
episodes.overview: When Mahad meets an old friend their ideals clash. Meanwhile the St. Nazaire is caught in some nasty weather

episodes.name: Cortes' Secret
episodes.overview: Cortes becomes angry when his traitor brother shows up. But will they put aside their differences to beat the Sphere? And is Cortes' brother really letting him know everything?

episodes.name: Island of the Child King
episodes.overview: Mahad and Lena find a make-shift orphanage and try to save its inhabitants from the Spere. But will they listen in time to save themselves?

episodes.name: Alice
episodes.overview: A Special Sphere agent crashs on Puerto Angel and causes trouble.

episodes.name: Secret Power
episodes.overview: Lena uses herself as bait rescue other abducted Seijins from an unkown foe.

episodes.name: Book of Worlds
episodes.overview: Both the Sphere and the pirates go off in search of the book of worlds, a powerful object that can be used to either unite or rule Skyland.

episodes.name: Infiltration
episodes.overview: Mahad and Lena sneak aboard the Monolith in an attempt to free their mother.

episodes.name: Blue Sky
episodes.overview: Is the Vector's new security system a defense for Puerto Angel or an elaborate trap of the Sphere?

episodes.name: The Secret of Temuera
episodes.overview: Mahad and Lena are in a race to find an ancient artifact called the "Origin" before Oslo finds it.

episodes.name: Kharzem Fortess (Part 1)
episodes.overview: The location to Kharzem is finally revealed and the final fight begins.

episodes.name: Kharzem Fortress (Part 2)
episodes.overview: The fight between good and evil, it boils down to Lena versus Oslo.
